name: SynthPong
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Use W and A for player one and UP and DOWN arrows for player two;

For mobile just touch on screen on your side;

D and LEFT ARROW makes you teleport to front;

ENTER for restart the game;

SPACE BAR for pause the game;

And press 1  (or touch with 6 fingers) to toggle between training mode (vs CPU) and multiplayer.

CREDITS

Code: mr Ziak

Audio: FreeSound

Music: Alexandr Zhelanov
